article.headline: Miss. Valley St. 76, Texas Southern 50
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. (AP) -- Freshman Stanford Speech had a triple-double and Jessie Taylor scored 19 points to lead Mississippi Valley State past Texas Southern 76-50 on Monday night. Speech had 14 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists for the Delta Devils (7-9, 5-2 Southwestern Athletic Conference), who led by as many as 29 and won their fourth of five to close a two-game homestand. Jeffrey Price added 16 points and Hosea Butler added 12 for MVSU, which plays its next four games on the road. Mike Sneed had 17 points and nine rebounds for Texas Southern (5-10, 3-4), which didn't get closer than nine in the second half. Valley shot 48.4 percent from the floor and held Texas Southern to 38.3 percent.
